price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߬ߝߍ߬ߞߊ߲ ߡߍ߲߫ ߠߴߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߓߐߟߌ ߟߏ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߛߊ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma yasmaʿūna al-ṣayḥata bil-ḥaqi dhālika yawmu al-khurūji
